name: Dracc Early Access Demo
description:
Dracc is a new aciton-rpg from Dead by April where you play as the orc Dracc.
Your mission is to defend the kingdom of Borghara from the invading goblins.

The game has classic rpg elements such as character progression, combat and loot, but is also heavily inspired by the platforming and action games of the 90s.

Dracc will of course feature new and original Dead by April music!

The game integrates with April army and players can use their april army account to login to the game and upload their progress.

You need an Aprilarmy.world rank 3 subscription to login to the game.

Minimum System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1 32 or 64 bit / OS: OSX 10.7 + Processor: Dual Core Processor at 2.0+ GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics Card: 1512 MB Nvidia or ATI graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB free space

The game supports PS4 Dualshock 4 gamepads.
